name: nativescript-gameanalytics
description: Official NativeScript SDK for GameAnalytics. GameAnalytics is a free analytics platform that helps game developers understand their players' behaviour by delivering relevant insights.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-gameanalytics; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: npm i; cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
